map.name: kitchen
map.info: This is a well furnished kitchen.

map.name: hallway
map.info: The hallway is an unadorned high room, with openings to other rooms and stairs going up and down.

map.name: attic
map.info: A large empty room, with a small window.

map.name: basement
map.info: A small, dark room, with stagnant moldy air, brick walls, earthen floor and a low wooden beams ceiling.

map.name: bridge
map.info: A high stone bridge connecting a tall redoubt to the west to the main walls of what looks to be a large medieval fortification to the east. The pastoral view to the north and south is charming.

map.name: living room
map.info: A large room well lit room, with wide windows opening to a scenic horizon.

map.name: bathroom
map.info: <dark:This is a small dark room. You can barely make out a light switch near the entrance.><lit:This is a small neat bathroom with white tiles on the walls and floor, a sink and a lavatory.>

items.name: baby
items.info: A small baby. <has_key:It is playing with a large iron key. ><watch_tv:It is watching the telly. ><has_apple:It is taking bites out of a shiny green apple.>

items.name: bathroom door
items.info: A white plywood door with a round brass handle.

items.name: castle door
items.info: A heavy door, made out of thick planks connected by crude but sturdy iron works.<examine: The wood is very dark as if it had been blackened by candle smoke over decades. Three wide horizontal iron bands marked by round rivet heads span the door width. There is a large key hole and a handle.>

items.name: tv
items.info: A wide screen TV is fixed on the wall to the kitchen. <off:It is turned off.><on:It is on. Cartoons are on.>

items.name: sofa
items.info: A comfy purple sofa.

items.name: remote
items.info: A black remote control, with buttons for powering the TV and changing channels. <powered:A red LED light on the remote is lit.>

items.name: castle key
items.info: This is a large, heavy pig iron key with a simple pattern.

items.name: bathroom key
items.info: This is a small modern brass key.

items.name: plunger
items.info: A common plunger with a wooden handle and a rubber cup.

items.name: towel
items.info: A medium sized white towel.

items.name: batteries
items.info: A small pile of batteries.

items.name: bowl
items.info: A small white ceramic bowl<milk: filled with milk><water: filled with water>.

items.name: milk
items.info: A large jug of milk.

items.name: apple
items.info: A large <clean:flawless sparkingly clean><!clean:somewhat grimy> green apple.

items.name: drawer
items.info:
A drawer at the top side of the cupboard. 
<open:It is open.><closed:It is closed.>

items.name: cupboard
items.info:
This is an ordinary kitchen cupboard, with a drawer 
and a door. <closed:The cupboard is closed.><open:The cupboard is open.>

items.name: table
items.info: The table is as long as the room, affixed against the western wall, with a kitchen sink installed.

items.name: refrigerator
items.info: The refrigerator is large and modern looking.<open: The door is open and the light inside is on.>

items.name: sink
items.info: The sink has faucets for cold and hot water.

items.name: player
items.info: Just plain old me...

items.name: stars
items.info: Outside you see the clear night sky of rural areas, far from any city lights, true black against which miriad stars are shining brightly.

items.name: horizon
items.info: Outside the window flat fields form a patchwork of hues of green and are bounded in the distance by forested hills. It is a bright summer day and the sun is high in the clear blue sky.
